title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 74 - Imposition Of Cigarette Taxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 74 - Imposition Of Cigarette Taxes

State Regulations
§ 74.1 - Imposition of tax on the possession of cigarettes for sale
§ 74.2 - Payment of tax on cigarettes possessed for sale; cigarette tax stamps
§ 74.3 - Affixation and cancellation of cigarette stamps
§ 74.4 - Forbidden sales of cigarettes
§ 74.5 - Imposition of tax on the use of cigarettes
§ 74.6 - Taxes imposed on qualified reservations
§ 74.7 - Agent certification

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 74

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 471[1], [4], [5], 471-e, 472 [1], 475, 1142[1], 1250; art. 20; L. 2002, chs. 1, 93; L. 2008, ch. 57, part RR-1; L. 2010, ch. 134, part
D
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
